H0.text: In addition to hosting the Academy Awards, what stand up comic took over for Craig Kilborn behind the desk of The Daily Show. Jon Stewart

H1.text: In addition to hosting the Academy Awards, what stand up comic took over for Craig Kilborn behind the desk of The Daily Show. Dennis Miller

H2.text: In addition to hosting the Academy Awards, what stand up comic took over for Craig Kilborn behind the desk of The Daily Show. Chris Rock

H3.text: In addition to hosting the Academy Awards, what stand up comic took over for Craig Kilborn behind the desk of The Daily Show. Tarid

A4.text: Later that year, when Craig Kilborn left the show to replace Tom Snyder on The Late Late Show, Stewart began hosting The Daily Show on Comedy Central.
